properties.description: Attractive three-bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Narahenpita Railway.
properties.longDescription: An attractive and modern three-bedroom semi-detached family home situated in a popular residential area, just 0.5 miles from Narahenpita Railway Station. The property has been recently renovated to a high standard and offers spacious and flexible living accommodation. The ground floor comprises a welcoming entrance hall, a generous living room with a feature fireplace, and a stunning open-plan kitchen/dining room with integrated appliances and bi-fold doors leading to the rear garden. Upstairs, there are three well-proportioned bedrooms and a contemporary family bathroom.

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden apartment.
properties.longDescription: This beautifully presented two double bedroom, two bathroom garden apartment is located in a highly sought-after development. The property is offered in excellent decorative order and boasts a spacious open-plan living area with a modern fitted kitchen, two generous double bedrooms (one with an en-suite shower room), and a stylish main bathroom. The apartment also benefits from a private patio area and access to well-maintained communal gardens.

properties.description: Spacious Commercial Space property for sale located in the heart of the Colombo.
properties.longDescription: A rare opportunity to acquire a spacious commercial property in a prime location in the heart of Colombo. The property offers versatile space suitable for a variety of uses, including retail, office, or showroom. The unit is predominantly open-plan and benefits from excellent natural light, high ceilings, and a prominent shop front. Additional features include a small kitchenette and two WCs.

properties.description: Large warehouse space available for rent, located in a prime location in Colombo with easy access to major roads.
properties.longDescription: This is a large warehouse space available for rent, located in a prime location in Colombo with easy access to major roads. The warehouse is suitable for storage and logistics operations. It features high ceilings, a large loading bay, and office space.

properties.description: A beautiful four-bedroom detached house in a peaceful area with scenic views.
properties.longDescription: A beautiful four-bedroom detached house in a peaceful area with scenic views. The property is set in a large garden and has a private swimming pool. The house is well-maintained and has a modern kitchen and bathrooms.

properties.description: A modern two-bedroom apartment with all amenities located in Matara.
properties.longDescription: A modern two-bedroom apartment with all amenities located in Matara. The apartment is on the top floor and has a balcony with sea views. It is fully furnished and has a well-equipped kitchen.

properties.description: Spacious five-bedroom house with a private pool and large garden.
properties.longDescription: A spacious five-bedroom house with a private pool and large garden. The house is located in a quiet residential area and is perfect for a large family. It has a large living room, a dining room, and a modern kitchen.

properties.description: Beautiful three-bedroom apartment with views of the park and modern amenities.
properties.longDescription: A beautiful three-bedroom apartment with views of the park and modern amenities. The apartment is located in a modern building with a gym and a swimming pool. It is fully furnished and has a well-equipped kitchen.

properties.description: Prime Commercial Space space with great potential for retail or office space.
properties.longDescription: A prime commercial space with great potential for retail or office space. The space is located in a busy commercial area and has a large shop front. It is suitable for a variety of businesses.

properties.description: A charming luxury family home located in a quiet neighborhood.
properties.longDescription: A charming luxury family home located in a quiet neighborhood. The house has a large garden and a swimming pool. It is well-maintained and has a modern kitchen and bathrooms.

properties.description: Recently renovated four-bedroom home with garden, garage and pool.
properties.longDescription: A recently renovated four-bedroom home with a garden, garage, and pool. The house is located in a quiet residential area and is perfect for a family. It has a large living room, a dining room, and a modern kitchen.

properties.description: Retail space located in a busy shopping district, perfect for small businesses.
properties.longDescription: A retail space located in a busy shopping district, perfect for small businesses. The space has a large shop front and is suitable for a variety of retail businesses.

properties.description: Charming one-bedroom apartment located in a vibrant city center area.
properties.longDescription: A charming one-bedroom apartment located in a vibrant city center area. The apartment is on the top floor and has a balcony with city views. It is fully furnished and has a well-equipped kitchen.

properties.description: A newly refurbished three-bedroom house with an open-plan living area.
properties.longDescription: A newly refurbished three-bedroom house with an open-plan living area. The house is located in a quiet residential area and has a large garden. It has a modern kitchen and bathrooms.

properties.longDescription: A beautiful large house with a large private garden and a garage. The house is located in a quiet residential area and is perfect for a family. It has a large living room, a dining room, and a modern kitchen.

properties.longDescription: A modern two-bedroom apartment with ample living space in a prime location. The apartment is on the top floor and has a balcony with city views. It is fully furnished and has a well-equipped kitchen.

properties.longDescription: A modern two-bedroom house with ample living space in a prime location. The house is located in a quiet residential area and is perfect for a small family. It has a garden and a garage.
